title: incredibly slow download
body: i consistently get around 1/5 the speed downloading league files as downloading literally anything else, is there a fix for this?

replies.body: i know its like out of the thing your talking about but i real need you help so hear is the problem my league of legends is buggy and i dont know how to fix that i press the play button it takes 1 to 3 min to go on the mode i want to play or sometimes it doesnt work at all i just press it and nothing happens and IF i get into the game mod i want to play for example aram i press play it need to wait 2 to 3 min to go into the Q or it doesnt show at all and i am lucky and it lets me go into Q if the match found comes if someone denies it it freezes till i close leag and IF that works too than in the champion select it need to wait 30 to 40 sek or more to see waht champ i got or what runes or masteris i have in general my lol is bugged as hell PLEASE HELP ME!

There are a lot of potential causes for what's slowing down the download. The first steps I suggest taking can be found over in our [**Connection KB**](http://riot.com/12B7oac); there are a lot of steps but each one can help eliminate one potential cause or get a fix for the download speeds.

I'd also suggest making sure there are no settings on your router limiting its speeds either. Another player I helped recently had a similar problem, and once he changed the limiter the speeds went back to normal. If you don't know how to do that, or if the Connection Guide doesn't help, let Tech Support help troubleshoot those speeds [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They have a lot of in depth steps you can try in private with them. :)
